## strRandom() function

获取指定长度随机字符

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function strRandom(count: number, radix?: number): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  count | number | 长度 |
|  radix | number | _(Optional)_ 进制 0-36 |

**Returns:**

string

## Example


```ts
const str = strRandom(6, 16)// 获取取长度为6的随机16进制字符
```
